name: employee-tracker
description: This application was designed to help companies navigate, organize and manage their employee database from the command line terminal. It was built with [NodeJS](https://nodejs.org/en/) and utilizes the [Inquirer package](https://www.npmjs.com/package/inquirer) and the [MySQL](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mysql) package to connect to a MySQL database and perform queries.
